title: Best of The Herd: 01/30/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/30/2019
description:
Don't fall for the NBA fining Anthony Davis because Colin says they secretly love that on the week leading up to the Super Bowl the media is talking about the NBA. He thinks the Rams have far more on the line in terms of their legacy on Sunday.  Plus, former Patriots WR Danny Amendola, who Colin was told hates him, joins the show to tell him why and explain what it’s like being a part of the Patriots system.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
